items.sentence: I used to eat out a lot more often than I do now.
I used to tell people I knew how to speak French.
I want Tom stopped before he does anything worse.
I\'m not sure if it\'s a compliment or an insult.
I\'m not used to talking to people I don\'t know.
I don\'t think Tom knows Mary is in the hospital.
I haven\'t eaten French food since I left France.
I\'ll never forget all the help you\'ve given me.
Uncle Tom sends us Christmas presents every year.
We hadn\'t gone very far when it started to rain.
